thoughts.text: I have used the 'read_file' command to read the contents of the 'yaml_errors.txt' file and displayed them to the user. The user has reviewed the errors and made the necessary changes to the YAML code. I can now use the 'write_to_file' command to write the updated YAML code to a file.
thoughts.reasoning: I need to determine the next command to use based on the thoughts I have just outlined.
